# Question 2
```{r, message=FALSE}
homicide_raw = 
  read_csv( "./data/homicide_data.csv") %>% 
    mutate (
    city_state = str_c(city, ", ", state),
    result = ifelse(disposition != "Closed by arrest", "unsolved", "solved")) %>% 
    filter(!(city_state %in% c("Tulsa, AL", "Dallas, TX", "Phoenix, AZ", "Kansas City, MO")))
```
